description: The Bangtail outsole features Vibram Arctic Grip A.T. for grip on ice, an extended heel for increased ground contact necessary for braking, and siping in the lugs to improve traction on wet surfaces. The 5mm lug depth and placement are ideal for shedding mud and snow while enhancing traction.
name: Oboz Bangtail Mid Insulated B-Dry - Mens

specs.value: LWG Gold Rated nubuck leather; soft, abrasion resistant lining, Spandex snow gaiter, heel kick, printed mud guard, abrasion resistant collar overlay, 200g Freeze Guard insulation, B-DRY Waterproof Membrane, 100% PRET Repreve Laces, 100% Pret Webbing
Vibram® XS Trek + Arctic Grip Pods
